verses.verse: (For the choir director; on the Gittith. [A Psalm] of Asaph.) Sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> our strength; <S%H5797><s%> Shout <S%H7321><s%> joyfully <S%H7321><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Raise <S%H5375><s%> a song, <S%H2172><s%> strike <S%H5414><s%> the timbrel, <S%H8596><s%> The sweet <S%H9335><s%> sounding <S%H9335><s%> lyre <S%H3658><s%> with the harp. <S%H5035><s%>
Blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> at the new <S%H2320><s%> moon, <S%H2320><s%> At the full <S%H3677><s%> moon, <S%H3677><s%> on our feast <S%H2282><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
For it is a statute <S%H2706><s%> for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> An ordinance <S%H4941><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

He established <S%H7760><s%> it for a testimony <S%H5715><s%> in Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> When he went <S%H3318><s%> throughout <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> I heard <S%H8085><s%> a language <S%H8193><s%> that I did not know: <S%H3045><s%>
"I relieved <S%H5493><s%> his shoulder <S%H7926><s%> of the burden, <S%H5447><s%> His hands <S%H3709><s%> were freed <S%H5674><s%> from the basket. <S%H1731><s%>

"You called <S%H7121><s%> in trouble, <S%H6869><s%> and I rescued <S%H2502><s%> you; I answered <S%H6030><s%> you in the hiding <S%H5643><s%> place <S%H5643><s%> of thunder; <S%H7482><s%> I proved <S%H974><s%> you at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah. <S%H4809><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
"Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O My people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will admonish <S%H5749><s%> you; O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you would listen <S%H8085><s%> to Me!
"Let there be no <S%H3808><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> god <S%H410><s%> among you; Nor <S%H3808><s%> shall you worship <S%H7812><s%> any foreign <S%H5236><s%> god. <S%H410><s%>

"I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> am your God, <S%H430><s%> Who brought <S%H5927><s%> you up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> Open <S%H7337><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> wide <S%H7337><s%> and I will fill <S%H4390><s%> it.
"But My people <S%H5971><s%> did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to My voice; <S%H6963><s%> And Israel <S%H3478><s%> did not obey <S%H14><s%> Me.
"So I gave <S%H7971><s%> them over <S%H7971><s%> to the stubbornness <S%H8307><s%> of their heart, <S%H3820><s%> To walk <S%H1980><s%> in their own devices. <S%H4156><s%>
"Oh <S%H3863><s%> that My people <S%H5971><s%> would listen <S%H8085><s%> to Me, That Israel <S%H3478><s%> would walk <S%H1980><s%> in My ways! <S%H1870><s%>
"I would quickly <S%H4592><s%> subdue <S%H3665><s%> their enemies, <S%H340><s%> And turn <S%H7725><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> their adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>
"Those who hate <S%H8130><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> would pretend <S%H3584><s%> obedience <S%H3584><s%> to Him; And their time <S%H6256><s%> [of punishment] would be forever. <S%H5769><s%>
"But I would feed <S%H398><s%> you with the finest <S%H2459><s%> of the wheat; <S%H2406><s%> And with honey <S%H1706><s%> from the rock <S%H6697><s%> I would satisfy <S%H7646><s%> you."
